alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Haralson; Polk (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 24 at 6:03PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Haralson, southwestern Carroll and Polk Counties through 645 PM EST ... At 603 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Etna to near Edwardsville to near Barfield, and moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Cedartown, Buchanan, Bremen, Rockmart, Tallapoosa, Bowdon, Mount Zion, Aragon, Waco, Fish Creek, Etna, Eubank Lake, Esom Hill, Bowdon Junction, Antioch, Van Wert, Seney, Felton, and John Tanner State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
